results.title: Oral simvastatin combined with narrowband UVB for the treatment of psoriasis: A randomized controlled trial.
results.text_hl: Oral @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ combined with narrowband UVB for the treatment of @<m>DISEASE_Psoriasis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011565 @@@psoriasis@@@: A randomized controlled trial.

results.title: Deciphering the Association Between Psoriasis and Obesity: Current Evidence and Treatment Considerations.
results.text_hl: @CHEMICAL_apremilast @CHEMICAL_MESH:C505730 @@@Apremilast@@@ may induce @DISEASE_Weight_Loss @DISEASE_MESH:D015431 @@@weight loss@@@ as an adverse effect presenting also some beneficial metabolic actions. Finally, @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ and some antidiabetic drugs could decrease @<m>DISEASE_Psoriasis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011565 @@@psoriasis@@@ severity.

citations.NLM: Paroutoglou K, Papadavid E, Christodoulatos GS, Dalamaga M. Deciphering the Association Between Psoriasis and Obesity: Current Evidence and Treatment Considerations. Curr Obes Rep. 2020 Sep;9(3):165-178. PMID: 32418186

results.title: [Evaluation properties of hydrogels with simvastatin prepared on Carbopol 2020].
results.text_hl: Systemic or topical use of statins can be beneficial in @DISEASE_Alopecia @DISEASE_MESH:D000505 @@@alopecia@@@, @DISEASE_Erythema @DISEASE_MESH:D004890 @@@erythema@@@, @<m>DISEASE_Psoriasis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011565 @@@psoriasis@@@. In the following paper prepared and tested formulations including @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ gel obtained from the Carbopolu 2020 with the addition of selected excipients: @CHEMICAL_Polysorbates @CHEMICAL_MESH:D011136 @@@Tween 20@@@, @CHEMICAL_Propylene_Glycol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019946 @@@propylene glycol@@@, @CHEMICAL_Glycerol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005990 @@@glycerol@@@, @CHEMICAL_polyethylene_glycol_400 @CHEMICAL_MESH:C000595213 @@@PEG 400@@@.

citations.NLM: Owczarek A, Pluta J, Kogut J. [Evaluation properties of hydrogels with simvastatin prepared on Carbopol 2020]. Polim Med. 2010;40(1):57-64. PMID: 20446530

results.title: The effect of statins on psoriasis severity: a meta-analysis of randomized clinical trials
results.text_hl: In conclusion, the results of this meta-analysis indicate that statins, in particular @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@, reduce @<m>DISEASE_Psoriasis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011565 @@@psoriasis@@@ severity, especially in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with severe disease.

citations.NLM: Socha M, Pietrzak A, Grywalska E, Pietrzak D, Matosiuk D, Kiciński P, Rolinski J. The effect of statins on psoriasis severity: a meta-analysis of randomized clinical trials Arch Med Sci. 2020;16(1):1-7. PMID: 32051699
